metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert two 1.5V D-Cell alkaline batteries with correct polarity
2. The Bellbox will emit a 2-tone beep
3. Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Bellbox will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Function button for 10 seconds. All LEDs will flash once.
